text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Magna a cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Sydney today
I'm going to show you how to
troubleshoot errors that you receive
when you turn on Amazon Connect contact
lens let's get
started let's cover some of the reasons
for errors that occur when you turn on
Amazon connect contact lens and I will
show you ways to troubleshoot them we
must use the set recording and analytics
Behavior Block in our contact flow to
turn on contact lens conversational
analytics if you don't see this block
and instead find only the set call
recording Behavior block Amazon Connect
contact lens has not been turned on for
your instance here is how you can turn
it on at an instance level
after logging into the AWS Management
console navigate to the Amazon connect
console on the instances page choose the
instance Alias the instance alas is also
your instance name which appears in your
Amazon connect URL in the navigation
pane select analytics tools click on
edit enable contact lens finally choose
save now when you navigate to your
contact
flow in the navigation pane under blocks
type set recording and analytics block
once you locate it drag and drop this
block next to the set logging Behavior
Block in order to enable contact lens
analysis from from the beginning of the
flow under analytics choose enable
contact lens conversational
analytics enable chat and speech
analytics another scenario that might
occur is that users can view the contact
lens data for a specific contact to
overcome this make sure you added all
the security profile permissions
required to view the contact lens data
here is how you can do it on the
instances page choose the access URL and
log to your Amazon connect
instance in the navigation pane select
users and security
profiles the admin security profile by
Def default has all the necessary
permissions however if the user belongs
to a different security profile make
sure that you choose the correct
security profile and then choose from
these
permissions expand analytics and
optimization choose all for the
following types of permissions contact
search view my contacts search contacts
by conversation
characteristics search contacts by
keywords contact lens conversational
analytics contact lens custom
vocabularies contact lens theme
detection
rules recorded conversations redacted
and recorded conversations
unredacted finally choose
save so now the users can view the
contact lens data for all the
contacts you might notice that the set
recording and analytics Behavior block
can fail to turn on contact lens for a
contact when there is a transfer
involved note that if you want to
transfer a contact to another agent or q
and you want to continue using contact
lens to collect data you must add to the
flow another set recording and analytics
Behavior block with enable analytics
turned on you must do this because a
transfer generates a second contact ID
and contact record contact lens must run
on that contact as
well you can check the contact flow
locks to check if contact lens is turned
on and if there are any errors if you
have not already enabled flow logs here
is how you can do it on the instances
page choose the instance alias in the
navigation page choose flows select
enable flow
logs and click on
Save now let us add the set logging
Behavior
block navigate back to the instances
page and choose CH the instance URL in
the navigation pane choose routing flows
and select the contact flow in question
in the flow designer add a set logging
Behavior block and connect it to another
Block in the
flow open the properties for the block
choose enable or disable choose save
if you add a set logging Behavior block
to a flow that is already published you
must publish it again to start
generating logs for it now that we have
enabled flow logs let us go ahead and
place a test call to capture the flow
logs once the call is ended here is how
you can search the flow logs open the
Amazon Cloud watch
console go to logs and log
groups choose the log group for your
instance in the search box you can enter
the string you want to search for for
example all or a portion of the contact
ID after a couple of minutes Amazon
cloudwatch returns results you can open
each event to see what
happened you can also choose to receive
error notifications if contact lens
can't analyze a contact file even though
analysis is enabled on the flow when
this happens contact lens sends error
notifications using Amazon even Bridge
events to subscribe to these
notifications create a custom even
Bridge rule open Amazon even bridge
console
under get started select even Bridge
rule choose create rule enter a name and
description for the rule for event bus
select AWS default event bus for rule
type choose rule with an event pattern
choose next for Event Source choose AWS
events or even Bridge partner events
for event pattern do one of the
following choose the Event Source as AWS
Services choose the AWS Service as
Amazon
connect and choose the event type as
contact lens analysis State
change choose next for Target type
choose AWS service for select a Target
choose the AWS service that you want to
send notific ifications to when even
Bridge detects an event that matches the
event pattern in my case I am choosing
to create a cloudwatch log group to
receive these
notifications click next click next
again now you can review and create the
custom
Rule now you can receive notifications
at the Target location every time
contact lens cannot analyze I a contact
so now you know how to troubleshoot
errors that occur when you turn on
Amazon Connect contact
lens thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
